when I was on the school soccer team in

per game it's a habit something that you

use used to when you're talking about

I used to I used to I used to I used to
I used to so would gives you another

example when I was on the school soccer

when you were in high school what did

other option you can mix it in with use

this is a big one is that wood can only
be used to talk about past actions
things you did things you physically can
see or do used to it can be used for
that as well
but it actually has more functions so
used to I'm going to tell you about that
in a moment ok so as we mentioned there
are some situations where used to and
wood are interchangeable however there
are some situations where you have to

would in these situations the first

something that I did regularly maybe

yeah we used to be really close I

however in the second example can we use

wood if you're talking about past States
this is a past state you were a doctor
you are not a doctor anymore
that was your state so in this situation

so this refers to location you cannot
